Package sample.Model

Class StoreOrders

java.lang.Object
sample.Model.StoreOrders
All Implemented Interfaces:
Customizable
public class StoreOrders
extends java.lang.Object
implements Customizable
The StoreOrders class stores a list of all orders placed and allows for adding, removing, searching for, and exporting orders from this list.

  • Field Summary

    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.util.ArrayList<Order> orders

    Adds an order to the list of orders placed by the user.
    void exportDatabase​(java.io.File file)
    Writes a string representation of all orders that the user has placed to the specified file.
    Order findOrder​(int orderNumber)
    Searches for an order based on the given order number and returns the order if found.

    • getOrderNumbers

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getOrderNumbers()

      a list of all the order numbers that the user has placed

    • findOrder

      public Order findOrder​(int orderNumber)
      Searches for an order based on the given order number and returns the order if found.
      Parameters:
      orderNumber - the order number of the order being searched for
      Returns:
      the order with the corresponding order number if found, null if not found

    • exportDatabase

      public void exportDatabase​(java.io.File file) throws java.lang.Exception
      Writes a string representation of all orders that the user has placed to the specified file.
      Parameters:
      file - the file to write the orders to
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - if there is an issue writing to the file

    • add

      public boolean add​(java.lang.Object obj)
      Adds an order to the list of orders placed by the user.
      Specified by:
      add in interface Customizable
      Parameters:
      obj - the order to be added to the list
      Returns:
      true if the order was added successfully, false if the order was not an instance of Order

    • remove

      public boolean remove​(java.lang.Object obj)
      Removes an order from the list of orders placed by the user.
      Specified by:
      remove in interface Customizable
      Parameters:
      obj - the order to be removed from the list
      Returns:
      true if the order was removed successfully, false if the order was not an instance of Order
